data.title: Gators in the NBA update
authors: Compiled  Ray FitzGerald Pro Gators beat , Gainesville Sun
data.meta_description: Each week, The Sun will take a look at how former Gators like Minnesota Timberwolves small forward Mike Miller performed in the National Basketball Association during the regular season.
data.text:
Each week, The Sun will take a look at how former Gators performed in the National Basketball Association this regular season. Statistics are through Monday night's games.

Udonis Haslem ('99-'02) Miami: 6 games, 6 starts, 15 ppg, 7.2 rpg, 36 mpg

Al Horford ('04-'07) Atlanta: 5 games, 5 starts, 8.8 ppg, 8.8 rpg, 3.2 apg, 1.6 bpg, .4 spg, 31.4 mpg

Mike Miller ('99-'00) Minnesota: 6 games, 6 starts, 14.8 ppg, 4.3 rpg, 3.7 apg, 0.7 bpg, 38 mpg

David Lee ('02-'05) New York: 6 games, 4 starts, 10.2 ppg, 6.2 rpg, 2.2 apg, 1 spg, 29.3 mpg

Corey Brewer ('04-'07) Minnesota: 6 games, 6 starts, 6.5 ppg, 4.2 rpg, 1.8 apg, 0.3 bpg, 1.2 spg, 25.2 mpg

Joakim Noah ('04-'07) Chicago: 7 games, 4 ppg, 5.7 rpg, 1 apg, 0.9 bpg, .7 spg, 17.3 mpg

Marreese Speights ('06-'08) Philadelphia: 4 games, 4.5 ppg, 4 rpg, 1 apg, 1 bpg, 12.5 mpg

Matt Bonner ('00-'03) San Antonio: 5 games, 2.6 ppg, 3.2 rpg, 0.2 bpg, 13.8 mpg
